definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: (sense uncertain, CIS:i. 158 there occurs the n.pr.f. [[בעלאזבל]] Baal exalts? or is husband to? [v. [[זָבַל]]], of which [[אִיוֶבֶל]] is conjectured by DHM to be an intentional alteration, made for the purpose of avoiding the name Baal. If so, ´[[א]] perhaps suggested to the Hebrew ear the idea of un-exalted or un-husbanded), queen of Ahab, daughter of Ethbaal, king of Tyre 1Ki 16:31, 1Ki 18:4, 1Ki 18:13, 1Ki 18:19, 1Ki 19:1, 1Ki 19:2, 1Ki 21:5 +; 2Ki 9:7 +.
